Articles.Content:
I was testing a rover when i noticed a set of stairs on the victim recruitment centre, so i got out and found that they had proper hit boxs! i knew things had been updated, but no idea that they had that level of detail. My kerbal went to go visit the VAB and found stairs and working ladders.

SQUAD, im really impressed with this detail.

I hope soon that we will be able to go inside some of these buildings.

I was testing a rover when i noticed a set of stairs on the victim recruitment centre, so i got out and found that they had proper hit boxs! i knew things had been updated, but no idea that they had that level of detail. My kerbal went to go visit the VAB and found stairs and working ladders.

SQUAD, im really impressed with this detail.

I hope soon that we will be able to go inside some of these buildings.

Artyom did some amazing things, and it's absolutely beautiful.
Yes i agree the new space center looks AMAZING! and they did a great job

When you are building something in the VAB or Space Plane Hangar, you can see outside into the space center, but when you actually walk or drive up to it, you can't go inside because the doors are closed. It would be a neat little touch to be able to go inside with your kerbals and vehicles, maybe even land a space plane on the runway and park it back in the hangar, where it could be automatically recovered instead of having to do it manually? Just an idea though....
